m_szDocTitle: CONDUCTIVE MAT FOR BATTERY ELECTRODE PLATE REINFORCEMENT AND METHODS OF USE THEREFOR - JOHNS MANVILLE
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- CONDUCTIVE MAT FOR BATTERY ELECTRODE PLATE REINFORCEMENT AND METHODS OF USE THEREFOR United States Patent Application 20150099153 Kind                 Code: A1 Abstract: According to one embodiment, a plate or electrode for a lead-acid battery includes a grid of lead alloy material, a paste of active material applied to the grid of lead alloy material, and a nonwoven fiber mat disposed at least partially within the paste of active material. The nonwoven fiber mat includes a plurality of fibers, a binder material that couples the plurality of fibers together, an
